de.hadizadeh.positioning.connector

Class ConnectorMapFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hadizadeh.positioning.connector.ConnectorMapFragment

  • public class ConnectorMapFragment
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a map for displaying room models and connecting them with fingerprints
